data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nemésio, André, Ferrari, Rafael R. (2011): Species of Euglossa (Glossura) and E. (Glossuropoda) (Hymenoptera: Apidae: Euglossina) occurring in the Amazon, including new records for Brazil. Zootaxa 2885: 1-13, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.277598
